license:
# Instruct Dataset --- Licensing and Attribution ## **License and Usage Notice** **Instruct Dataset** for training **ReqBrain** is retrieved (subset) from Software Requirments Dataset (**SwaRD**). SwaRD is an identified collection that aggregates requirements from multiple publicly available sources, each governed by its own license terms. While all source datasets are available for research and academic purposes, they are not uniformly licensed; therefore, **similar to SwaRD, the Instruct Dataset is not distributed under a unified license**. ## **Important Notice to Users:** • Each constituent dataset retains its original license as specified in its source.
• Users are responsible for reviewing and complying with the license terms associated with each dataset before reuse or redistribution.
• Attribution to original authors and repositories is provided in the *Dataset Attributions by License* section.
The authors of the Instruct Dataset have made every effort to preserve the provenance and licensing details of all incorporated data. However, the authors do not claim any rights beyond those granted by the original licensors and do not provide any warranty or legal advice regarding the reuse of third-party datasets. **If you wish to use Instruct Dataset or any of its components in your own work, please ensure that you consult and adhere to the relevant license conditions and cite the corresponding original sources as specified.** **Citation Request:** If you use the Instruct Dataset in your work, we kindly ask that you cite our dataset paper or repository to acknowledge the effort of data integration, standardization, and documentation. This is in addition to any citations required by the original dataset licenses. **Note:** The responsibility for license compliance lies with the end user. Please consult the original dataset licenses to ensure appropriate usage. ## **Dataset Attributions by License** ### **Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)** • **NLP4RE ReqEval**: Licensed under CC BY 4.0. Please cite and read [7]. • **PURE**: Licensed under CC BY 4.0. Attribution to [8] is required. • **ReqExp**: Licensed under CC BY 4.0. Please cite and read [9]. • **SecReq**: Licensed under CC BY 4.0. Please cite and read [11]. • **Software Requirement Risk Prediction**: Licensed under CC BY 4.0. Attribution to [12]. ### **COEST Community Dataset** All COEST datasets require attribution through citation of their corresponding papers, as per the COEST dataset reuse policy. • **HIPAA**: Cite Cleland-Huang et al. (2010) [32]. • **IceBreaker**: Cite Cleland-Huang et al. (2005) [33]. • **InfusionPump**: Retrieved from COEST cite and read at [35, 36]. • **Kiosk**: Retrieved from COEST cite and read at [35, 36]. ### GNU General Public License v3.0 (GPL-3.0) • **PROMISE**: Licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0 (GPL-3.0) [37]. ## **References** [7] N.
